blogPost.excerpt: Every piece of content is handpicked for you by your friends. You only see posts that your friends choose for you to see. With Khuro, you can - Easily choose which friends and friend groups see your posts. - Share photos with your friends. - Post your availability, plans, and thoughts.
blogPost.body: Every piece of content is handpicked for you by your friends. You only see posts that your friends choose for you to see. With Khuro, you can - Easily choose which friends and friend groups see your posts. - Share photos with your friends. - Post your availability, plans, and thoughts.
blogPost.title: Khuro - Made for you. Tailored by your friends.
blogPost.author: Will Campbell
